GSD.description:
binder: fix UAF of ref->proc caused by race condition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 603a47f2ae56bf68288784d3c0a8c5b8e0a827ed. For more details please see the references link.
